item.title: Report E-2024110385
item.description:
Report E-2024110385

Identified by scraper @ 2024-11-21T12:39:47+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-11-05
  • City: VALLEY GROVE
  • State: WV
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: CLEAN HARBORS ENVIRONMENTAL SERVICES, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Driver was beginning his day 0800et and during the pre-trip inspection noticed liquid that had dripped onto the trailer tire. The driver put down some absorbent pads and called the company emergency response number. The team was dispatched and arrif=ved at 0900et and began clean up procedures. The drum was placed in a salvage drum along with the absorbents used to collect the material. The clean up was completed by 1030et. There was approximately 1 gallon released into the trailer and less than 1/2 gallen made it to the pavement.
